page.title: 12THE BRITISH SHOE CORPORATION
page.content: On the Industrial Estate one of the largest firms is the British Shoe Corporation.This company employs over two and a half thousand people on this site alone.Worldwide it employs about thirty five thousand people. It is located within easy access to the M1 Motorway so that it can distribute about two million pairs of shoes each week from this huge warehouse complex. Also on the same estate is the Leicester depot of the Automobile Association which has been there since 1982.They provide a twenty four hour recovery service in Leicestershire for its memebers.Approximately one hundred and thirty people work from the centre and the average mechanic covers forty breakdowns a week.Some of the famous people it has helped have been Brian Clough and Diana Dors.
